author: Shawn Yuan
title: China: Wuhan revises coronavirus death toll up by 50%
description: City says 1,290 more people died than previously reported amid questions about the credibility of China's reporting.
content:
Chengdu, China - China's central city of Wuhan, the first coronavirus-hit area, has revised its official death toll upward by 50 percent, raising more questions about the accuracy of its figures.
Wuhan added 1,290 fatalities to the previously reported 2,579 … [+5845 chars]
